channel.title: Api on marabunta
channel.description: Recent content in Api on marabunta

item.title: API
item.description: All tasks are managed via an HTTP REST API. Creating a task: The enpoint: /tasks/ HTTP method CRUD Description Status code POST Create Create a task 201 (OK) GET Read Get all tasks 200 (OK) GET Read /tasks/:UUID Get a task 200 (OK), 404 (If ID not found) PUT Update /tasks/:UUID Update/modify a task 204 (OK), 404 (If ID not found) DELETE Delete /tasks/:UUID Delete a task 204 (OK), 404 (If ID not found)
